ViewArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the view for which a version is being created.
ViewArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the view for which a version is being created.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:connect:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:instance/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*/view/[-:a-zA-Z0-9]*$  
Update requires: Replacement

VersionDescription.description: The description for the view version.
VersionDescription.markdownDescription:
The description for the view version.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 4096  
Pattern: ^([\p{L}\p{N}_.:\/=+\-@,]+[\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:\/=+\-@,]*)$  
Update requires: Replacement

ViewContentSha256.description: The view content hash to be checked.
ViewContentSha256.markdownDescription:
The view content hash to be checked.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9]{64}$  
Update requires: Replacement

ViewVersionArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the created view version.
ViewVersionArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the created view version.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:connect:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:instance/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*/view/[-:a-zA-Z0-9]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Version.markdownDescription:
The version of the view.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption
